name: [G4B] clan official server 24/7 gk_falling
description:
Get to the bottom safely. Eat plants 2 survive. Discover forbidden jumping mechanics.

Most routes untested, soft locking is possible!

CONTROLS (PLZ READ)

  • WASD or Arrows to Move
  • SPACE to JUMP
  • "1" to drop a checkpoint (when stationary, and on the ground)
  • "Q" to eat food
  • "R" to respawn at checkpoint
  • "ZERO" to Restart level
  • S/DOWN to crouch/pick up plants/look down
  • CROUCH AND JUMP TO JUMP HIGH
  • W/UP to look up

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Submission for Game-A-week 2022. Theme: Falling

Heavily inspired by/stolen from the 2nd greatest game of all time: https://www.glorioustrainwrecks.com/node/11388

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Ambient sound is used as-is from kangaroovindaloo on freesound.org https://freesound.org/people/kangaroovindaloo/sounds/397445/

using https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
